meanings.definition: A person or thing that is similar to an earlier type or style.
meanings.sent1: The car was a throwback to the vintage models of the 1950s.
meanings.sent2: The fashion trend was a throwback to the 90s with its neon colors.
meanings.sent3: Seeing the old-fashioned phone was a throwback to simpler times.
meanings.sent4: Her retro hairstyle was a throwback to the glamorous Hollywood era.
meanings.sent5: The antique shop was a throwback to a bygone era of craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: A reversion to an earlier ancestral characteristic.
meanings.sent1: The genetic mutation was a throwback to a trait from generations ago.
meanings.sent2: The sudden appearance of freckles was a throwback to her Irish heritage.
meanings.sent3: His love for traditional music was a throwback to his ancestors' cultural roots.
meanings.sent4: The wild behavior of the puppy was a throwback to its wolf ancestors.
meanings.sent5: The old family recipe was a throwback to the flavors of the past.
